title: Enhancing Medical Practical Competencies: Student-Centered Language Education Design for Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theories and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete collaborative tasks at over 80% proficiency through verbal interaction in VR environments.
Learners show improvement in linguistic expression by providing peer feedback three or more times in online discussions.
Learners can create and share two or more types of language-learning content using digital collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
